summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2018 ACURA ILX. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FUEL GAUGE SHOWED THAT THE FUEL TANK WAS FULL; HOWEVER, THE VEHICLE RAN OUT OF FUEL. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO CENTER ACURA (5230 VAN NUYS BLVD, SHERMAN OAKS, CA 91401, 818-528-1300) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL TANK FAILED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 350. *TT  CONSUMER STATED GAS TANK WAS REPLACED 2 TIMES AND IS FINE. *JB
